about_the_game:
Hippoboar Rancher's cute catlike companion Eve stars in her very own game! Soar through space to collect Hippoboars, avoid the dangerous Thornies, and crank up your jet booster to set a new record!

Features five different game modes:

  • Normal mode: Jet your way through 30 treacherous waves to collect all the Hippoboars and bring home a bounteous dinner feast!

  • Endless mode: Test your endurance and see how many wave of Hippoboar-collecting you can muster before the you're overcome by Thornies.

  • 100 Hippoboar BBQ: Collect all 100 Hippoboars as fast as possible and set a new time record!

  • 30 Second Trial: You have just half a minute, and there's Hippoboars everywhere! Can you grab them all before you run out of time?

  • Briar Patch Blitz: Brave the treacherous Thorny briar patch and practice your precision navigation to make your way to the center of the maze and claim your prize!

Features music from MEGAFEPPS's CD "Electronic Thunder".
CD available on MEGAFEPPS's official Booth shop.

name: Space Eve-tan!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Hippoboar Rancher's cute catlike companion Eve stars in her very-own game! Soar through space to collect Hippoboars, avoid the dangerous Thornies, and crank up your jet booster to set a new record! Features five different gameplay modes, including an endless challenge!
